intro:
It's time for a new and improved party time!
Compete or cooperate—there's no limit on the fun when everyone's together!
description:
Get ready for an all-new sequel to the party game that anyone can enjoy!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 6 players can join in the fun!

Enjoy a collection of 30 intuitive and easy-to-play minigames!
Spend quality time with friends and family and have a blast!

[Free Mode]
Pick a game freely and play!
With both competitive and cooperative games, there are lots of ways to play!
In single-player mode, record your high scores and compete against players from around the world!

[Party Mode]
Choose a selection of games to play in order, and compete to become the champion!
You can select the option to double the points in the last game!

[Online Mode]
Play together with players from around the world!
Hop in a Quick Match to start the fun right away!

<Character Edit>
Make your own special character with further enhanced customization features, and watch as they join the party!
